sentence: Home improvement warehouse operator The Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) on Tuesday caught some bullish commentary from analysts at BMO Capital Markets.
The firm maintained its "Market Perform" rating on HD but lifted its price target to $53, suggesting a small upside to the stock's Monday closing price of $51.79.
BMO Capital also upped its earnings estimates for the company, citing prospects of strong first quarter.
Shares of Home Depot ( HD ) have a 2.24% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $51.79.
The stock has technical support in the $46-$47 price area.
If the shares can firm up, we see overhead resistance around the $53-$57 price levels.
The Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) is not recommended at this time, holding a Dividend.com DARSâ„¢ Rating of 3.4 out of 5 stars.
